13  package net.sf.oval.constraint;
14  
15  import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
16  
17  import java.math.BigDecimal;
18  import java.math.BigInteger;
19  import java.util.Map;
20  
21  import net.sf.oval.ConstraintTarget;
22  import net.sf.oval.Validator;
23  import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
24  import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
25  
26  /**
27   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
28   */
29  public class DigitsCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<Digits>
30  {
31  	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
32  
33  	private int maxFraction = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
34  	private int maxInteger = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
35  	private int minFraction = 0;
36  	private int minInteger = 0;
37  
38  	/**
39  	 * {@inheritDoc}
40  	 */
41  	@Override
42  	public void configure(final Digits constraintAnnotation)
43  	{
44  		super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
45  		setMinInteger(constraintAnnotation.minInteger());
46  		setMaxInteger(constraintAnnotation.maxInteger());
47  		setMinFraction(constraintAnnotation.minFraction());
48  		setMaxFraction(constraintAnnotation.maxFraction());
49  	}
50  
51  	/**
52  	 * {@inheritDoc}
53  	 */
54  	@Override
55  	public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
56  	{
57  		final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
58  		messageVariables.put("maxInteger", Integer.toString(maxInteger));
59  		messageVariables.put("minInteger", Integer.toString(minInteger));
60  		messageVariables.put("maxFraction", Integer.toString(maxFraction));
61  		messageVariables.put("minFraction", Integer.toString(minFraction));
62  		return messageVariables;
63  	}
64  
65  	/**
66  	 * {@inheritDoc}
67  	 */
68  	@Override
69  	protected ConstraintTarget[] getAppliesToDefault()
70  	{
71  		return new ConstraintTarget[]{ConstraintTarget.VALUES};
72  	}
73  
74  	/**
75  	 * @return the maxFraction
76  	 */
77  	public int getMaxFraction()
78  	{
79  		return maxFraction;
80  	}
81  
82  	/**
83  	 * @return the maxInteger
84  	 */
85  	public int getMaxInteger()
86  	{
87  		return maxInteger;
88  	}
89  
90  	/**
91  	 * @return the minFraction
92  	 */
93  	public int getMinFraction()
94  	{
95  		return minFraction;
96  	}
97  
98  	/**
99  	 * @return the minInteger
100 	 */
101 	public int getMinInteger()
102 	{
103 		return minInteger;
104 	}
105 
106 	/**
107 	 * {@inheritDoc}
108 	 */
109 	public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
110 			final Validator validator)
111 	{
112 		if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
113 
114 		final BigDecimal value;
115 
116 		if (valueToValidate instanceof BigDecimal)
117 		{
118 			value = (BigDecimal) valueToValidate;
119 		}
120 		else if (valueToValidate instanceof BigInteger)
121 		{
122 			value = new BigDecimal((BigInteger) valueToValidate);
123 		}
124 		else if (valueToValidate instanceof Integer)
125 		{
126 			value = new BigDecimal((Integer) valueToValidate);
127 		}
128 		else if (valueToValidate instanceof Long)
129 		{
130 			value = new BigDecimal((Long) valueToValidate);
131 		}
132 		else if (valueToValidate instanceof Short)
133 		{
134 			value = new BigDecimal((Short) valueToValidate);
135 		}
136 		else if (valueToValidate instanceof Byte)
137 		{
138 			value = new BigDecimal((Byte) valueToValidate);
139 		}
140 		else
141 		{
142 			value = new BigDecimal(valueToValidate.toString());
143 		}
144 
145 		final int valueScale = value.scale();
146 		final int integerLen = value.precision() - valueScale;
147 		final int fractionLen = valueScale > 0 ? valueScale : 0;
148 		return integerLen <= maxInteger && integerLen >= minInteger && fractionLen <= maxFraction
149 				&& fractionLen >= minFraction;
150 	}
151 
152 	/**
153 	 * @param maxFraction the maxFraction to set
154 	 */
155 	public void setMaxFraction(final int maxFraction)
156 	{
157 		this.maxFraction = maxFraction;
158 	}
159 
160 	/**
161 	 * @param maxInteger the maxInteger to set
162 	 */
163 	public void setMaxInteger(final int maxInteger)
164 	{
165 		this.maxInteger = maxInteger;
166 	}
167 
168 	/**
169 	 * @param minFraction the minFraction to set
170 	 */
171 	public void setMinFraction(final int minFraction)
172 	{
173 		this.minFraction = minFraction;
174 	}
175 
176 	/**
177 	 * @param minInteger the minInteger to set
178 	 */
179 	public void setMinInteger(final int minInteger)
180 	{
181 		this.minInteger = minInteger;
182 	}
183 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
